description:
TeamViewer allows remote control between two computers on the internet.  In portable mode it does not require either computer to do a full install.

    After the install this package gives instructions on how to start TeamViewer in portable mode, making it easy for a non-technical user to download and start teamviewer in portable mode.
summary: TeamViewer allows remote control between two computers on the internet.  In portable mode it does not require either computer to do a full install.
author: TeamViewer Inc.
